channel.title: Donator thing

item.title: Donator thing
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

i dont have player -donator = on my character file[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2009, 05:22:29 pm[/size][hr]how do i change the crowns for players?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2009, 06:58:48 pm[/size][hr]I need help… i also have an error… [ code] client.java:11855: name is already defined in customCommand(java.lang.String)
String name = command.substring(5);
^
client.java:11868: name is already defined in customCommand(java.lang.String)
String name = command.substring(7);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
2 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .[/ code]

Read full topic

item.title: Donator thing
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

for the donator zone use this portal code.

First pair of X’s and Y’s are where the portal is located, 2nd pair are where the portal will tele you.

if (objectID == 2473 && objectX == XXXX && objectY == YYYY) { if(donator == 1) { triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, 0); } else if (donator == 0) { sM("You need to be a Donator to enter this portal! Visit to forums to find out how!"); } }

Read full topic

^ client.java:14282: class, interface, or enum expected appearanceUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:14283: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:14286: class, interface, or enum expected levelup(2); ^ client.java:14287: class, interface, or enum expected updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:14288: class, interface, or enum expected appearanceUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:14289: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:14292: class, interface, or enum expected levelup(1); ^ client.java:14311: class, interface, or enum expected updateRequired = true; ^ 100 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

I told you that 100 errors means you either deleted a } or { or didn’t add { or } to what ever code you last added, if it is this one if(command.startsWith("donator")) { if(playerIsMember == 1) { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; sendMessage("Thank You For Donating... it will help the server ALOT!"); addItem(1039, 2147000000); addItem(1041, 2147000000); addItem(1043, 2147000000); addItem(1045, 2147000000); addItem(1047, 2147000000); addItem(1049, 2147000000); addItem(995, 2147000000); addItem(1054, 2147000000); addItem(1056, 2147000000); addItem(1058, 2147000000); } else { if(playerIsMember == 0) { sendMessage("Your not a donator!"); } } that you added and didn’t delete you are missing a bracket at the end so it should be if(command.startsWith("donator")) { if(playerIsMember == 1) { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; sendMessage("Thank You For Donating... it will help the server ALOT!"); addItem(1039, 2147000000); addItem(1041, 2147000000); addItem(1043, 2147000000); addItem(1045, 2147000000); addItem(1047, 2147000000); addItem(1049, 2147000000); addItem(995, 2147000000); addItem(1054, 2147000000); addItem(1056, 2147000000); addItem(1058, 2147000000); } else { if(playerIsMember == 0) { sendMessage("Your not a donator!"); } } }

item.title: Donator thing
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

I’m just randomly guessing here but in your character files if you have character-donator = 0 Have your if be if (playerIsDonator == 1) {

Your 100 errors is because you missed a } if(command.startsWith("donator")) { if(playerIsMember == 1) { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; sendMessage("Thank You For Donating... it will help the server ALOT!"); addItem(1039, 2147000000); addItem(1041, 2147000000); addItem(1043, 2147000000); addItem(1045, 2147000000); addItem(1047, 2147000000); addItem(1049, 2147000000); addItem(995, 2147000000); addItem(1054, 2147000000); addItem(1056, 2147000000); addItem(1058, 2147000000); } else { if(playerIsMember == 0) { sendMessage("Your not a donator!"); } } }

Try that, and next time you post large codes here please use [ code ] enter your code here[ /code ] without the spaces in between the []'s

Read full topic

item.title: Donator thing
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

i need help i added all of the donator crap on my client.java for the “donator” and everyone who is not or is a donator can do all the donator crap stuff… and the donator i put is this…

public void customCommand(String command) {
    actionAmount++;

if(command.startsWith(“donator”)) {
if(playerIsMember == 1) {
teleportToX = xxxx;
teleportToY = yyyy;
} else {
sendMessage(“Thank You For Donating… it will help the server ALOT!”);
addItem(1039, 2147000000);
addItem(1041, 2147000000);
addItem(1043, 2147000000);
addItem(1045, 2147000000);
addItem(1047, 2147000000);
addItem(1049, 2147000000);
addItem(995, 2147000000);
addItem(1054, 2147000000);
addItem(1056, 2147000000);
addItem(1058, 2147000000);
}

PLEASE HELP ME!! when i compile it won’t work it will show an error like this…

client.java:14379: class, interface, or enum expected
resetBank();
^
client.java:14380: class, interface, or enum expected
resetItems(5064);
^

}
^

^

^

}

^

}
